description.p: This AO is a copy of product_material_composition_relationship from part 45. I know of no application in electrical design where we have an explicit tolerance on bulk material in a bom. suggest a subtype of Scr with a amount: SET[1:1] to support that case. also, need an ip that states that the members of amount (when there are more than one) need to be different complex instances of Value_with_unit and qualified_measure_schema AOs. I don't know where the requirement that Value_with_unit shall only be a ratio.
